text: Kenneth Campbell (March 26, 1881 – March 28, 1951) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of British Columbia from 1924 to 1928 from the electoral district of Nelson, as a Liberal. He was a businessman and manager of the Kootenay Granite and Monumental Company. ==References== Category:British Columbia Liberal Party MLAs Category:1881 births Category:1951 deaths
title: Kenneth Campbell (politician)
